languages.text: "Прошу меня простить, Леди Теодора. Ваше присутствие оказывает на меня столь ошеломляющий эффект, что я забыл о времени". {n}Эдельтрад церемонно откланивается и, не одарив вас ни взглядом более, разворачивается и удаляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Прошу меня простить, Леди Теодора. Ваше присутствие оказывает на меня столь ошеломляющий эффект, что я забыл о времени". {n}Эдельтрад церемонно откланивается и, не одарив вас ни взглядом более, разворачивается и удаляется.{/n}

languages.text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Прошу меня простить, Леди Теодора. Ваше присутствие оказывает на меня столь ошеломляющий эффект, что я забыл о времени". {n}Эдельтрад церемонно откланивается и, не одарив вас ни взглядом более, разворачивается и удаляется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot about the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without giving you another look.{/n}

"I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot about the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without giving you another look.{/n}

"I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

"I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

"I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

languages.text: “我请求您的原谅，西奥多拉女士。您对我产生了极其深重的影响，这让我完全忘记了时间。”{n}艾德萨德庄重地鞠了一躬，看都没看你一眼，就离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我请求您的原谅，西奥多拉女士。您对我产生了极其深重的影响，这让我完全忘记了时间。”{n}艾德萨德庄重地鞠了一躬，看都没看你一眼，就离开了。{/n}

languages.text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, lady Theodora. Su presencia me tiene tan impactado que se me ha olvidado la hora». {n}Edelthrad hace una profunda reverencia y se marcha sin volver a mirarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, lady Theodora. Su presencia me tiene tan impactado que se me ha olvidado la hora». {n}Edelthrad hace una profunda reverencia y se marcha sin volver a mirarte.{/n}

languages.text: 「お許しください、シオドーラ様。シオドーラ様の存在は私に大きな影響を与えているので、時間を忘れてしまいました」{n}エデルスラドは儀礼的にお辞儀をし、一瞥もせずにその場を去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください、レディ・テオドラ。あなたの存在は私に大きな影響を与えているので、時間を忘れてしまいました」 {n}エデルスラドは儀礼的にお辞儀をし、一瞥もせずにその場を去った。{/n}
「お許しください、シオドーラ様。シオドーラ様の存在は私に大きな影響を与えているので、時間を忘れてしまいました」{n}エデルスラドは儀礼的にお辞儀をし、一瞥もせずにその場を去った。{/n}

languages.text: « Je vous prie de me pardonner, dame Théodora. Votre présence a un tel effet sur ma personne que j'en perds la notion du temps. » {n}Edelthrad s'incline respectueusement et prend congé sans vous accorder la moindre attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je vous prie de me pardonner, dame Théodora. Votre présence a un tel effet sur ma personne que j'en perds la notion du temps. » {n}Edelthrad s'incline respectueusement et prend congé sans vous accorder la moindre attention.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Vergebung, Lady Theodora. Eure Präsenz hatte einen so nachhaltigen Eindruck auf mich, dass ich die Zeit ganz vergessen habe." {n}Edelthrad verbeugt sich feierlich und geht, ohne dich eines weiteres Blickes zu würdigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Vergebung, Lady Theodora. Eure Präsenz hatte einen so nachhaltigen Eindruck auf mich, dass ich die Zeit ganz vergessen habe." {n}Edelthrad verbeugt sich feierlich und geht, ohne dich eines weiteres Blickes zu würdigen.{/n}

languages.text: "Bağışlayın Leydi Theodora. Varlığınız üzerimde öylesine derin bir etki yaratmış ki zamanın nasıl geçtiğini fark etmemişim." {n}Edelthrad, son derece resmî bir selam çakıyor ve sana bir bakış daha atmadan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lady Theodora. Your presence has such a profound effect on me that I well forgot the time." {n}Edelthrad bows ceremoniously and takes his leave without sparing you another look.{/n}
